Brand: Beauty 360

Category: Facial Moisturizer/Treatment

Ingredients: CARTHAMUS TINCTORIUS (SAFFLOWER) SEED OIL, ROSMARINUS OFFICINALIS (ROSEMARY) LEAF OIL, BORAGO OFFICINALIS SEED OIL, TOCOPHERYL ACETATE

Category: Facial Moisturizer/Treatment

Ingredients: CARTHAMUS TINCTORIUS (SAFFLOWER) SEED OIL, ROSMARINUS OFFICINALIS (ROSEMARY) LEAF OIL, BORAGO OFFICINALIS SEED OIL, TOCOPHERYL ACETATE

Ingredient concerns: HIGH: Allergies & Immunotoxicity; LOW: Cancer, Developmental and Reproductive Toxicity, Use Restrictions
